author: cutting
msg: Fix HADOOP-170.  Permit FileSystem clients to examine and modify the replication count of individual files.  Also fix a few replication-related bugs.  Contributed by Konstantin Shvachko.

author: jta
msg: DERBY-913 : Add chapters 3 and 4, update Ch 1 and 2, and update build.xml
so the Working With Derby doc builds properly on case sensative systems
like Linux.  Committed patch by Stanley Bradbury <Stan.Bradbury@gmail.com> .

author: ryman
msg: Fixed Ant task to fail gracefully when test cases fail. Generate test-suite-results.zip.
